attributes.action: Give John Smeaton a knighthood, or other recognition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
John Smeaton saw a terrorist get out of his burning jeep and attack a police man. "What's the score? Ah've got tae get this sorted" he said, as he single-handedly stopped international terrorism at Glasgow Airport.

This man, who was just doing his job, kept cool under pressure. He instinctively knew what he had to do, and he did it. While most people would have ran screaming, John got it "sorted". If only more of us were like John, the world would be a much safer place.

For risking life and limb for what is right, he deserves some official recognition, and possibly to be made Scotland's Official Superhero.
